summary: A childless middle-aged couple faces a marital crisis.
cast: Shin Saburi|Michiyo Kogure|Kôji Tsuruta|Chishû Ryû|Chikage Awashima|Keiko Tsushima|Kuniko Miyake|Eijirô Yanagi|Hisao Toake|Yûko Mochizuki|Kôji Shitara|Matsuko Shiga|Yôko Kosono|Kinichi Ishikawa|Yoko Osakura|Etsuko Miyama|Noriko Hinatsu|Mie Kitahara|Tami Yamamoto|Eiko Yamada|Jun Tanizaki|Tomoka Hasebe|Shôichi Fujioka|Toshinosuke Nagao
title: El sabor del té verde con arroz
